summary: This mod adds fingerless versions of 11 different gloves to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds fingerless versions of 11 different gloves to the game: 

-Blades 
-Dragonplate 
-Dragonscale 
-Dwarven 
-Ebony 
-Elven 
-Elven Light 
-Glass 
-Iron 
-Orcish 
-Steel Plate 

They are all craftable with the appropriate perks (the Blades gloves need steel smithing and your character to be over level 15), and have also been added to the leveled lists. The gloves in this version have adjusted stats to reflect the fact that they would be lighter but offer less protection; there is also another version where the gloves are identical in every respect except appearance to their namesakes. The other version can be found here: 

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57246/?

If you wish to try some gloves on to see how they appear, there is a chest containing prop versions of the gloves in the bards college in Solitude (on the ground floor, in the room to the right as you enter through the main door). This mod doesn't conflict with my previous mods for fingerless gloves, but it does duplicate the gloves found in those mods.

Callmegraham made a youtube video about the mod which can be found here:
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BrCT8iiVK-k&feature=youtu.be]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BrCT8iiVK-k&feature=youtu.be[/url]
author: theincrediblenick
